description: Provides general guidance around the kind of access Control to Read, Search, Create, Update, or Delete a resource.
name: ResourceSecurityCategory

text.div:
ResourceSecurityCategory

Provides general guidance around the kind of access Control to Read, Search, Create, Update, or Delete a resource.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/resource-security-category

title: ResourceSecurityCategory
